author: Special Correspondent
text:
Burglars struck at Woraiyur here and looted gold jewellery and cash from the house of a businessman when he was away with his family.

The offence came to light after the businessman Ramakrishnan involved in sale of chemical products returned on Tuesday. Ramakrishnan, a resident of Ramalinga Nagar, had left for Coimbatore with his family in a car to attend a marriage reception. He returned on Tuesday to find the front side grill gate opened and the valuables and cash stolen. Gold jewellery weighing 60 sovereigns and Rs. 5 lakh were stolen, according to the complaint. Senior police officers inspected the crime scene and conducted inquiries. Fingerprint experts visited the spot where a detective dog was brought to track the route taken by the culprits.
title: House burgled
